title: User Signup Success
description: Verify that a user can successfully sign up with valid credentials and receives a confirmation.

steps.description: Navigate to the signup page.
Input valid email address, username, and password.
Submit the signup form.
Confirm account creation success message is displayed.
Verify user is redirected to login page or dashboard according to flow.

title: User Login Failure with Incorrect Password
description: Ensure login fails when an incorrect password is entered with a valid username/email.

steps.description: Navigate to login page.
Enter valid username/email with incorrect password.
Click login button.
Confirm error message indicating invalid credentials is displayed.
Verify that user remains on the login page.

title: Password Recovery Flow
description: Verify that users can initiate password recovery and receive a recovery email.

steps.description: Navigate to the password recovery page.
Enter registered email address.
Submit the password recovery request.
Confirm success message about email sent is displayed.
Verify email is received with valid reset link.

title: Multi-Tenant and Restaurant Context Switching
description: Verify that user can select different tenants and restaurants, and the views and data update accordingly without data leakage.

steps.description: Login to the application.
Select a tenant from tenant selector.
Verify the tenant context is updated and UI reflects tenant-specific data.
Select a restaurant under the chosen tenant.
Verify restaurant-specific data is displayed and previous restaurant data is not visible.
Switch to a different tenant and restaurant.
Confirm the data view updates correctly and no data from previous tenant or restaurant persists.

title: Create and Submit Survey
description: Verify the feedback system allows creating surveys, submitting responses, and calculating accurate NPS scores.

steps.description: Navigate to the survey builder page.
Create a new survey with multiple question types.
Publish the survey.
Access the feedback form as a customer would.
Complete and submit the survey.
Verify that the survey response is recorded.
Navigate to NPS engine page.
Confirm NPS score and trend charts include the newly submitted response and calculations are correct.

title: Analytics Dashboard Data Accuracy and Export
description: Ensure analytics dashboards display correct data with responsive charts, AI insights are relevant, and reports export properly.

steps.description: Navigate to General Analytics page.
Verify charts render correctly and data matches backend statistics.
Open AI Insights page.
Confirm AI insights are displayed and relevant to available data.
Generate and export a detailed report.
Verify the exported file is generated successfully, data within is correctly formatted and matches dashboard data.

title: Campaign Creation and Communication Dispatch
description: Verify users can create, edit, delete campaigns, and send communications without errors.

steps.description: Navigate to Campaigns page.
Create a new campaign with valid details.
Ensure the campaign appears in the campaign dashboard.
Edit the campaign.
Verify updates are saved and reflected correctly.
Delete the campaign.
Confirm campaign is removed from dashboard.
Send out communication for an existing campaign.
Validate communication is dispatched without errors and notifications are shown.

title: Gamification Events and Rewards Tracking
description: Verify gamification features track events and rewards accurately with real-time updates.

steps.description: Navigate to Gamification dashboard.
Create and configure a new event.
Confirm event appears in the event list.
Trigger event participation or reward earning.
Verify rewards update immediately and user engagement metrics reflect the event.
View engagement tracking page.
Ensure statistics match performed actions.

title: QR Code Generation and Scanning
description: Verify that QR codes can be generated for restaurants and scan to access the correct feedback forms.

steps.description: Navigate to the QR Code management page.
Generate QR code for a selected restaurant location.
Verify QR code image is displayed and corresponds to the correct restaurant.
Scan QR code using a mobile device.
Confirm scanning redirects to correct feedback collection form.

title: Subscription and Billing with Stripe Integration
description: Verify subscription management with correct pricing plans, payment processing, and billing status updates.

steps.description: Navigate to Billing page.
Review available pricing plans.
Ensure pricing plans are displayed correctly.
Select a subscription plan and proceed to payment.
Complete payment using Stripe test card.
Verify payment success and subscription status updates accordingly.
Cancel subscription.
Confirm subscription cancelled state is reflected.

title: Accessibility Settings Application and Verification
description: Ensure accessibility features can be configured and settings apply throughout the application.

steps.description: Navigate to Accessibility settings page.
Enable various accessibility options (e.g. high contrast, screen reader support).
Verify UI updates to reflect accessibility settings.
Navigate through multiple pages.
Confirm accessibility settings persist across views.
Run automated accessibility audit.
Ensure no critical accessibility issues are present.

title: Performance Benchmark: PWA Installation and Offline Support
description: Verify the app can be installed as a PWA and functions correctly offline with cached data.

steps.description: Load application on supported browser.
Trigger PWA installation prompt and install the app.
Confirm app installs and launches successfully as PWA.
Load various pages and cache data using the app.
Disconnect network to simulate offline mode.
Attempt to navigate cached pages and perform supported interactions.
Verify pages load correctly with cached content and offline features work as intended.

title: Notification Toast Messages Display and Dismissal
description: Verify notifications are shown as toast messages for various events and can be dismissed without blocking app interactions.

steps.description: Trigger an action that generates a success notification.
Confirm toast with success message appears.
Trigger an error to generate an error notification.
Verify error toast message is shown.
Dismiss the notifications manually.
Ensure notifications disappear and UI interactions continue smoothly.

title: Routing System Role-Based Access Control
description: Verify protected routes enforce role-based access control and unauthorized users are redirected properly.

steps.description: Log in as a regular user.
Attempt to access an admin-only route.
Verify that user is redirected or shown access denied message.
Log in as an admin user.
Access the same protected route.
Confirm access is allowed and page content loads.
Navigate to a non-existent route.
Ensure application shows a 404 or error page gracefully.

title: Custom Hook useFeedback Integration and Error Handling
description: Unit test the custom hook useFeedback for expected behavior, including edge cases and error handling.

steps.description: Write unit tests using Vitest for useFeedback hook to verify data fetching, caching, and update mechanisms.
Simulate network errors and invalid data responses.
Confirm hook handles errors gracefully and exposes appropriate error states.
Test integration of useFeedback hook within components.
Ensure component renders correctly with hook data and updates properly.

title: Third-Party Integration Failure and Fallback
description: Verify the application handles third-party service failures gracefully with fallback mechanisms.

steps.description: Simulate failure or unavailability of an integrated service (e.g., Stripe, Supabase, analytics).
Confirm appropriate error messages or fallback UI is shown to the user.
Attempt to retry integration action.
Verify that retry succeeds if service is restored.
Ensure the rest of the application remains functional without crashing.

title: UI Responsiveness and Mobile Optimization
description: Verify the app UI components respond appropriately to different screen sizes and input types, optimized for mobile and touch.

steps.description: Open the app on desktop browser and verify layout and component spacing.
Resize browser window to various smaller widths.
Confirm UI components adapt fluidly without layout breaks.
Open the app on multiple mobile devices and simulators.
Verify components respond to touch gestures, swipe interactions, and pull-to-refresh as per design.
Test mobile PWA installation experience.
Confirm smooth installation and app launch.

title: Offline Synchronization and Conflict Handling
description: Verify offline support and synchronization mechanisms correctly sync offline updates when network resumes, handling conflicts appropriately.

steps.description: Perform user actions that update data while online (e.g., submit feedback).
Switch the app to offline mode.
Perform additional updates (e.g., create survey or edit profile) while offline.
Restore network connectivity.
Verify offline updates are synchronized with backend without data loss.
Confirm conflict resolution occurs gracefully or user is notified for manual resolution.
